00036 static void freeTerminatedProcesses(void) {
00037         int i, j; 
00038         
00039         for ( i = 0; i < MAX_PROCESS; ++i ){
00040                 if ( processTable[i].state == TERMINATED ) {
00041                         processTable[i].pid = -1;
00042                         freeFrame(processTable[i].sFrame);
00043                         freeFrame(processTable[i].hFrame);
00044                         for ( j = 0; j < MAX_CHILDS; ++j )
00045                                 if ( processTable[i].childs[j] != -1 )
00046                                         terminate(j, KILL_EXIT_STATUS);                 
00047                                         processTable[i].state = DEAD;
00048                                         processTable[i].name[0]=  '\0';
00049                 }
00050         }
00051         
00052         return;
00053 }

00055 int initMultitasker(pfunc_t init) {
00056         static int firstTime = TRUE;
00057         int i, j;
00058         pid_t pid;
00059 
00060         if ( !firstTime ) {
00061                 return FALSE;
00062         }
00063         firstTime = FALSE;
00064         
00065         for ( i = 0; i < MAX_PROCESS; ++i ) {
00066                 processTable[i].pid = -1;
00067                 processTable[i].state = DEAD;
00068                 processTable[i].childsQty = 0;
00069                 processTable[i].rpgOld = 0;
00070                 for ( j = 0; j < MAX_FILES; ++j ){
00071                         processTable[i].files[j] = &(fileSystems[i][j]);
00072                         processTable[i].files[j]->ptr = processTable[i].files[j]->buffer = fileBuffers[i][j];
00073                         processTable[i].files[j]->fd = j;
00074                         processTable[i].files[j]->flag = (_READ | _WRITE);
00075                         processTable[i].files[j]->bufferSize = SCREEN_SIZE;
00076                 }
00077         }
00078         
00079         if ( (pid = createProcess("init", init, 0, BACKGROUND)) == -1 ) {
00080                 return FALSE;
00081         }
00082         
00083         for ( i = 0; i < MAX_TTY; ++i )
00084                 ttyRestPlace[i] = -1;
00085         initProcess = &processTable[pid];
00086         initProcess->priority = 0;
00087         nextProcess = initProcess;
00088         mtActivated = TRUE;
00089         
00090         return TRUE;
00091 }
00092 
00093 void multitasker(void) {
00094 
00095         if (!mtActivated)
00096                 return;
00097         if ( runningProcess != NULL && runningProcess->atomicity == ATOMIC )
00098                 return;
00099         nextProcess = (runningProcess == NULL) ? nextProcess : getNextTask();
00100         if ( nextProcess != runningProcess) {
00101                 if (nextProcess == initProcess && runningProcess != NULL && runningProcess->state == RUNNING){
00102                         nextProcess = runningProcess;
00103                 }
00104                 else{
00105                         /* This is done when loading the init process for the first time */
00106                         if ( runningProcess != NULL ) {
00107                                 if ( runningProcess->state == RUNNING )
00108                                         runningProcess->state = READY;
00109                                 asm volatile("mov %%esp, %0": "=r"(runningProcess->esp));
00110                                 asm volatile("mov %%ebp, %0": "=r"(runningProcess->ebp));
00111                         }
00112                         /* Protection */
00113                         setFramePresence(nextProcess->sFrame, TRUE);
00114                         setFramePresence(nextProcess->hFrame, TRUE);
00115                         asm volatile("mov %0, %%esp":: "r"(nextProcess->esp));
00116                         asm volatile("mov %0, %%ebp":: "r"(nextProcess->ebp));
00117                         if ( runningProcess != NULL ) {
00118                                 setFramePresence(runningProcess->sFrame, FALSE);
00119                                 setFramePresence(runningProcess->hFrame, FALSE);
00120                         }
00121                         nextProcess->state = RUNNING;
00122                 }
00123         }else {
00124         }
00125         freeTerminatedProcesses();
00126         runningProcess = nextProcess;
00127         ++runningProcess->tickCounter;
00128         if (runningProcess != initProcess && runningProcess->level == FOREGROUND ) 
00129                 sysSetTTYFocusedProcess(runningProcess->pid, runningProcess->tty);
00130         
00131         return;
00132 }

00134 static void wakeUpProcess(process_t *process, int status) {
00135         process->waitedStatus = status;
00136         process->state = READY;
00137 
00138         return;
00139 }

00141 void sysSelfBlock(){
00142         runningProcess->state = BLOCKED;
00143         forceMultitasker();
00144         
00145         return;
00146 }

00148 int sysUnblock(pid_t pid){
00149         if (processTable[pid].state != BLOCKED){
00150                 return -1;
00151         }
00152         processTable[pid].state = READY;
00153         
00154         return 0;
00155 }
00156 
00157 void waitTty(tty_t tty) {
00158         ttyRestPlace[tty] = runningProcess->pid;
00159         runningProcess->state = BLOCKED;
00160         forceMultitasker();
00161         
00162         return;
00163 }
00164 
00165 void signalTty(tty_t tty) {
00166         pid_t pid;
00167         pid = ttyRestPlace[tty];
00168         if ( processTable[pid].pid != -1 ) {
00169                 processTable[pid].state = READY;
00170                 ttyRestPlace[tty] = -1;
00171         }
00172         
00173         return;
00174 }

00176 static void alertWaitingProcesses(pid_t pid, int status) {
00177         int i;
00178         process_t *process;
00179         
00180         if(pid == -1)
00181                 return;
00182         
00183         process = &processTable[processTable[pid].ppid];
00184         
00185         if ( process->state == WAITING_CHILD )
00186                 wakeUpProcess(process, status);
00187 
00188         for ( i = 0; i < MAX_PROCESS; ++i )
00189                 if ( (processTable[i].state == WAITING_PID) && (processTable[i].waitingPid == pid) )
00190                         wakeUpProcess(&processTable[i], status);
00191         
00192         if ( process->sleepingPid != -1 ) {
00193                 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_TTY; ++i )
00194                         if ( ttyRestPlace[i] == process->sleepingPid ) {
00195                                 ttyRestPlace[i] = -1;
00196                         }
00197                 wakeUpProcess(&processTable[process->sleepingPid], status);
00198         }
00199 
00200         return;
00201 }
00202 
00203 void terminate(pid_t pid, int status) {
00204         int i;
00205         pid_t ppid;
00206         if( pid == -1)
00207                 return;
00208 
00209         ppid = processTable[pid].ppid;
00210         for( i = 0; i < MAX_CHILDS; ++i)
00211                 if(processTable[ppid].childs[i] == pid)
00212                         processTable[ppid].childs[i] = -1;
00213         
00214         processTable[ppid].childsQty--;
00215         if (processTable[pid].level == FOREGROUND && processTable[pid].childsQty == 0){
00216                 sysSetTTYFocusedProcess((ppid > 0) ? ppid : 0, processTable[pid].tty);
00217         }
00218         alertWaitingProcesses(pid, status);
00219         processTable[pid].state = TERMINATED;
00220         processTable[pid].atomicity = UNATOMIC;
00221 }

00223 void refreshProcessesCPUs(){
00224         int i;
00225         double total = 0;
00226         
00227         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_PROCESS ; ++i){
00228                 if (processTable[i].pid != -1){
00229                         total += processTable[i].tickCounter;
00230                 }
00231         }
00232         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_PROCESS ; ++i){
00233                 if (processTable[i].pid != -1){
00234                         processTable[i].cpuPercent = processTable[i].tickCounter / total * 100;
00235                 }
00236         }
00237         return;
00238 }
00239 
00240 void clearProcessesTicks(){
00241         int i;
00242         
00243         for (i = 0 ; i < MAX_PROCESS ; ++i){
00244                 if (processTable[i].pid != -1){
00245                         processTable[i].tickCounter = 0;
00246                 }
00247         }
00248 }

00254 char *getProcessName(pid_t pid) {
00255         if ( pid > MAX_PROCESS || pid < 0 )
00256                 return NULL;
00257         return processTable[pid].name;
00258 }
